title: Wireless Technology & Innovation | Mobile Technology | Qualcomm

ProductsSupportCompany
Introducing the next generation of mobile innovation.

The Qualcomm Snapdragon mobile platforms are built to deliver immersive experiences, lightning-fast 5G connectivity, and cutting-edge performance.

Meet the new Snapdragon platforms

Welcome to the Invention Age.

We're applying over 30 years of mobile expertise to transform industries, enable customers, and enrich lives. By unlocking 5G, we ushered in an era without barriers to invention, where the possibilities are endless - the Invention Age. Here's how it's unleashing a time of rapid technological acceleration.

This is the Invention Age

Invent with us.

Qualcomm is a company of inventors that unlocked 5G, ushering in an age of rapid acceleration in connectivity and new possibilities. We're looking for inventive minds to help fuel what's next in 5G.

Qualcomm Incorporated includes Qualcomm's licensing business, QTL, and the vast majority of its patent portfolio. Qualcomm Technologies, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Qualcomm Incorporated, operates, along with its subsidiaries, substantially all of Qualcomm's engineering, research and development functions, and substantially all of its products and services businesses.
